title: CleanMyMac X now tuned to find and remove spyware from Russia and Belarus to protect users’ data
content:
CleanMyMac X by developer MacPaw is releasing a new category today called Suspicious Apps in its Uninstaller module that quickly identifies, reviews, and removes apps originating from Russia and Belarus to protect users from potential cyber threats.

more…

The post CleanMyMac X now tuned to find and remove spyware from Russia and Belarus to protect users’ data appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: CleanMyMac X is releasing a new category called Suspicious Apps that identifies, reviews, and removes apps originating from Russia and Belarus.
